sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"关心的，体贴的"之意。
means: considerate ： 指能设身处地为别人着想，给予同情或谅解。
thoughtful ： 指为他人着想，主动关怀，做有益于他人的事。
attentive ： 指对人关怀备至，热情周到，这可能出于真诚，也可能出于私利。

sentence.Network_en: The patient has the right to considerate and respectful care.
sentence.Network_cn: 病人有权得到周到而礼貌的照顾。

sentence.Network_en: We have all wished for men who are more considerate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都曾祈求能找到更加体贴的男人。

sentence.Network_en: She is always polite and considerate towards her employees.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对待雇员总是客客气气，关心体谅。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... conscientious 认真的，自觉的 considerate 体贴的 contemplative 好沉思的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... consider v 考虑 considerate a 考虑周到的 insidious a 阴险的.
求大专英语B级单词表_百度知道 ... companion n.同伴，同事；伴侣 considerate a.考虑周到的，体谅的 county n.[英国]郡，[美国]县.
至字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 真挚;诚挚〖 honest〗 周到〖 considerate;thoughtful〗 大〖 great;maximum〗.

list.abs: 赵丽词汇5500最新——可下载_英语_天涯部落 ... detain 拘留 considerable 相当多的，大量的 as fat as an elephant 胖的象大象.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... consider v. 考虑 considerable adj. 相当大的 considerate adj. 考虑周到的.
2013年高考英语必背单词汇总___高分网 ... 7.refuse—refusal 拒绝 8.consider—consideration 考虑 9.discover—discovery 发现.
对价（consideration）(Consideration)是英美法中有关合同成立所必须具备的一个要素。按英美法解释，合同当事人之间存在着我给你是为了你给我的关 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'showing careful thought'): from Latin consideratus, past participle of considerare 'examine' (see consider)

entry.def: Someone who is considerate pays attention to the needs, wishes, or feelings of other people.

example.ex: I think he's the most charming, most considerate man I've ever known...
example.tran: 我觉得他是我所认识的最有魅力并且最为体贴的男士。

example.ex: I've always understood one should try and be considerate of other people.
example.tran: 我一直认为一个人应该尽量为他人着想。

means.word_mean: 1. showing concern for the rights and feelings of others;

sentences.sentence: "friends considerate enough to leave us alone"

auth_sentence.content: Really considerate not just out for your dough.
auth_sentence.res_content: Really considerate not just out for your dough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Really considerate not just out for your dough.

auth_sentence.content: I accept you are normally a careful and considerate driver.
auth_sentence.res_content: I accept you are normally a careful and considerate driver.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I accept you are normally a careful and considerate driver.

auth_sentence.content: We were very considerate of each other in the beginning.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were very considerate of each other in the beginning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were very considerate of each other in the beginning.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得考虑的, 相当可观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider[v.考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作]+able能……的→adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的
consider考虑+ate……的→考虑到的
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
in进入+side边→adj.&n.&adv.里面[的,地],内部[的,地]
out外面+side边→adj.&n.&adv.外面[的,地],外部[的,地]
considerable[adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的]+ly表副词→considerably相当地
preside[v.[at,over]主持]+ent人→主持[的人]
preside主持+ium地方或团体→n.主席团
reside[v.居住,驻扎;属于]+nce→n.住处,住宅
considerate[adj.考虑周到的,体谅的]+ion表名词→consideration体谅, 考虑
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
side旁边+way路→n.小路, 小巷,人行道
sub下+side坐→坐下去→平息
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或地位等"; 2. 表形容词,"具有……的"; 3. 表动词,"做,造成;使"

stems_affixes.word_buile: celib不结婚+ate人或地位等→n.独身者;adj.不结婚的;禁欲的
grade等级+uate=ate人或地位等→一级一级走完学业→毕业
col共同+legi读+ate具有……的→共同读书→学院的
consider考虑+ate具有……的→考虑到的
ef出现+femin女人+ate具有……的→出现女人状态
in进+ate具有……的→innate与出生一起进来→天赋的
in进入+veter老+ate具有……的→使成为老的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有节制的,中等的,适度的,温和的,稳健的

re再+gener产生+ate具有……的→重新产生生命→改过自新的
sit坐+uate=ate做,造成;使→使其坐于→使处于
ad加强+voc+ate人或地位等→增强声音→拥护
celib不结婚+ate人或地位等→n.独身者;adj.不结婚的;禁欲的
de加强+leg法律+ate人或地位等→加强法律之人→代表
doctor博士+ate人或地位等→n.博士学位;博士头衔
elector选举人+ate人或地位等→n.[全体]选民
grade等级+uate=ate人或地位等→一级一级走完学业→毕业
re反+prob正直+ate人或地位等→不正直→败坏[之人]
sur下面+rog要求+ate人或地位等→要求下面[有人]→代理人
candid坦白的+ate人或地位等→白色的人→候选人
ad加强+voc+ate人或地位等→增强声音→拥护
de加强+leg法律+ate人或地位等→加强法律之人→代表
grade等级+uate=ate人或地位等→一级一级走完学业→毕业
re反+prob正直+ate人或地位等→不正直→败坏[之人]
at使+tenu细+ate做→使……细薄→变薄
dom统治+in+ate做,造成;使→v.支配,占优势

stems_affixes.value_cn: [不以人作主语的]使容易,使便利
stems_affixes.word_buile: facility便利;灵巧+ate做,造成;使→facilitate
frustr犯错误+ate做,造成;使→v.挫败,阻挠,使灰心
in进入+filtr=filter过滤+ate做,造成;使→v.渗透,渗入
liquid液体+ate做,造成;使→像把水弄清一样→清理
re反+monstr显示+ate做,造成;使→显示反对→抗议

means.word_mean: 体贴的, 体谅的, 考虑周到的；为（他人）着想的

sentences.en: We think that he is the most considerate person we have ever met.
sentences.cn: 我们认为他在我们碰到的人中间是最能体谅人的。

sentences.en: He is always considerate to old people.
sentences.cn: 他对老人一向体贴入微。

sentences.en: It was very considerate of you to send me a postcard.
sentences.cn: 你想得真周到, 寄给我明信片。

jushi.english: We think that he is the most considerate person we have ever met.
jushi.chinese: 我们认为他在我们碰到的人中间是最能体谅人的。

jushi.english: He is always considerate to old people.
jushi.chinese: 他对老人一向体贴入微。

jushi.english: He is considerate about this matter.
jushi.chinese: 他在这个问题上考虑周到。
